review_request.name: subject

review_request.name: review_rating
review_request.description: The rating or feedback being requested from the recipient

shipping_update.name: parcel_id

shipping_update.description: Earliest time window for parcel delivery on the scheduled date.

shipping_update.description: Latest time window for parcel delivery on the scheduled date.

shipping_update.name: delivery_type

shipping_update.name: parcel_status

shipping_update.name: contact_phone
